data:item.name: Integrating SE05X to FRDM MCXA
data:item.display_title: Integrating EdgeLock® SE05X to FRDM-MCX-A development boards
data:item.overview: This demo project provides a detailed information on how to integrate the EdgeLock® SE05X series into the FRDM development boards of MCX-A family. Additionally, the project contains several demo applications to showcase how to enable security on the MCX-A family.
